Comment: Delete this file once the feature is implemented. Used for diagnostics
SingleLineQueryWith_$: Max salary of all employees in all companies except one is $(Max(Companies.Where(x => x.Name != 'Sherwood Forest Timber, Inc').Select(c => c.Employees.Where(e => e.Salary > 100000)).Select(x => x.Salary)))
SingleLineQueryWith_$value: $value(Companies.Where(x => x.Name != 'Sherwood Forest Timber, Inc').Select(c => c.Employees.Where(e => e.Salary > 100000)).Select(x => x.Salary))
SingleLineQueryWith_$merge: $merge(Companies.Where(x => x.Name != 'Sherwood Forest Timber, Inc').Select(c => c.Employees.Where(e => e.Salary > 100000)).Select(x => x.Salary))

SingleLineQueryWith_$copyFields.employeeFields: $copyFields(Companies.Where(x => c.CompanyData.Name != 'Sherwood Forest Timber, Inc').Select(c => c.Employees.Where(e => e.Salary > 100000)).First())
